alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Hempstead; Lafayette; Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 11:24PM CST until March 02 at 11:45PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN HEMPSTEAD...NORTHEASTERN LAFAYETTE...NEVADA AND NORTHWESTERN COLUMBIA COUNTIES... At 1124 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Okolona to 6 miles southeast of Prescott to near Bodcaw to Lewisville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hope, Prescott, Stamps, Waldo, Lewisville, McNeil, Emmet, Buckner, Perrytown, Rosston, Willisville, Bodcaw, Bluff City, White Oak Lake State Park, Cale, Patmos, Waterloo, Falcon, Boughton and College Hill. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for southwestern Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until midnight CST for southwestern Arkansas. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.
